name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
description:
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Heal self for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Heal self for 2 HP. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Heal self for 2 HP. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Unworried Crown: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
storytext: "One who is favored by fortune can even find priceless treasures in the most deadly of traps."
